name: OTurret
description:
OTurret - is an exciting action game with elements of tower defense that immerses players in the captivating story of a small yet courageous frog. In this game, your main objective is to survive in a dangerous world, battling hordes of gigantic insects that are willing to take a piece of you.

To survive, the frog utilizes its engineering skills. Players have the opportunity to construct various defensive structures, including cannons, crossbows, magnetic traps, and even the mighty BFG (Big Friendly Gun). Your creativity and strategic skills will come in handy for creating the best defensive systems to help the frog fend off the insect onslaught.
